PPLoc: Corporate Intranet site known as Unity
activities: Employment and human resources data for individuals and in aggregate (data collected that is report-based, such as  rosters of employees or headcount totals by country, as well as organization charts and the like).
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, United Kingdom
industrysector: Business Eqpt (other than computers) - (BUS)Household Consumer Goods - (HCG)
personaldata: Human resource data transmitted on-line via a Human Resource Information System.
recoursemech: Since we are only certifying on behalf of employment related data, the dispute resolution mechanism will be the EU data protection authorities.
